availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Isaac Van Arsdale (Mercer County, Kentucky, sheriff. )

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Van Arsdale. Father of Frank Van Arsdale and Nimrod Van Arsdale. Sheriff in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 773.
Find A Grave, "John Isaac Van Arsdale (c1804-1890)," Memorial #5040634, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5040634 (accessed April 5, 2019).
